title: Wound Healing Effectivity of the Ethanolic Extracts of Ageratum conyzoides L. Leaf (White and Purple Flower Type) and Centella asiatica and Astaxanthin Combination Gel Preparation in Animal Model
abstract: The study's objective was to determine the wound healing activity of the combination of ethanolic extracts of Ageratum conyzoides L. leaf (white and purple), Centella asiatica, and astaxanthin gel preparation.
